data.name: newListener
data.value:
Blessings To You {0},

Welcome to the St. Paul Primitive Baptist Church Email Listening Ministry. Thank you for becoming a Subscriber. You will receive Sunday's Messages from the St. Paul Primitive Baptist Church, Austin, TX. Morning Service each week; where Elder Bryon K. Miller is the Pastor. You will Receive your Sunday Morning Message within 24-72hrs. following every Sunday Morning Service.

We are now now "Live Streaming" through Facebook Live. An Email Option to choose from is Available for Hearing the Sunday Morning Message or Click a Link to Watch Video of the Pre-Recorded Live Stream on my YouTube Channel [Elder Bryon Miller]. Please Subscribe for easier access of any Service on the YouTube Channel.

You may Give an Offering to any of the Ministries of St. Paul Primitive Baptist Church (ie...Email Ministry General Fund-Tithes/Offering, Building Fund-Restoration Project, Love Offering-A Special Gift to the Pastor).

Select Any of the Available Option Below.

Send Cashier's Check or Money Order To:

Attention: Pastor B. Miller
ST. PAUL PRIMITIVE BAPTIST CHURCH
2209 East 14th Street
Austin, TX. 78702

Send Through Cash App or Paypal

ADD A NOTE, MEMO or MESSAGE
St. Paul Primitive Baptist Church
(ie...Email Ministry General Fund-Tithes/Offering, Building Fund-Restoration Project, Love Offering-Special Gift to the Pastor).

***SECURITY NOTE***

(A Personal Email Message of Donation Received will be delivered upon receipt. If you have any questions, Please Contact Elder Bryon Miller personally by:
Email: pastormiller2209@att.net or
Text: (512) 296-4246
-Identifying yourself as an Email Subscriber by Last Name & Email Address. Once Verified you will Receive a Call back from Elder Miller. These Processes are in place to Protect your Privacy, Personal Information, the Integrity and Trust of this Ministry & Staff, and the Well-Being of St. Paul PBC)

You may decide at any time that you no longer wish to receive these emails by simply emailing me to be removed from the List. Your Messages will be delivered from:

bryon436@gmail.com
pastormiller2209@att.net

Please Add these Email Addresses to your Contacts.

If you ever have trouble locating your Messages from this Ministry, always check your Spam Folder before notifying our Technical Services Team by Replying to this Welcome Email Message. Sometimes your Email Provider may not recognize this as safe, especially if you have not added me to your Contacts.

My Prayer is that you enjoy the emails with expectancy as all our Email Listeners.

Thank You For Your Support.

Be Blessed.

WE LOVE YOU AND AIN'T NOTHING YOU CAN DO ABOUT IT!

Elder Bryon K Miller, Pastor
St. Paul Primitive Baptist Church
Email Listening Ministry
2209 East 14th Street
Austin, TX. 78702
data.comment: The html format for the emails being sent to new listeners

data.name: newSermon
data.value:
Good Afternoon {0},

Watch all our sermons on YouTube and subscribe for easier access.

Also, give us a follow on Facebook, where we host our weekly live streams

You may give an offering to any of the ministries of St. Paul Primitive Baptist Church (ie...Email Ministry General Fund-Tithes/Offering, Building Fund-Restoration Project, Love Offering-A Special Gift to the Pastor).

Select Any of the Available Option Below.

Send Cashier's Check or Money Order To:

Attention: Pastor B. Miller

2209 East 14th Street
Austin, TX. 78702

Send Through Cash App or Paypal

ADD A NOTE, MEMO or MESSAGE
St. Paul Primitive Baptist Church
(ie...Email Ministry General Fund-Tithes/Offering, Building Fund-Restoration Project, Love Offering-Special Gift to the Pastor).

***SECURITY NOTE***

(A personal email message of donation received will be delivered upon receipt. If you have any questions, please contact Elder Bryon Miller personally by:
Email: pastormiller2209@att.net or
Text: (512) 296-4246
-Identifying yourself as an Email Subscriber by Last Name & Email Address. Once verified you will receive a call back from Elder Miller. These processes are in place to protect your privacy, personal information, the integrity and trust of this Ministry & Staff, and the well-being of St. Paul PBC)

Thank for your support and be blessed.

WE LOVE YOU AND AIN'T NOTHING YOU CAN DO ABOUT IT!

Elder Bryon K Miller, Pastor
St. Paul Primitive Baptist Church
Email Listening Ministry
2209 East 14th Street
Austin, TX. 78702
